('i was in an abusive relationship with an ex partner who would come home drunk every night one night we got into a fight because he thought i was cheating when he saw my phone on vibrate he left and returned even more intoxicated he lunged at me and tried to strangle me i managed to push him off using self defense techniques accidentally causing him to hit his head on a table corner he became motionless and i called the police when i returned i found him dead from the impact this event led to years of therapy and a successful self defense plea in court', 0)

('i was in my kitchen when i heard the couple next door arguing again it was nothing new but then i heard a loud crash and everything went silent i rushed over and found the wife lying on the floor the husband was in shock he kept saying it was coincidental he said he was throwing something across the room in anger and she stepped in its path it hit her on the head and she fell hard he was trying to wake her up but she wasnt responding he said it wasnt supposed to happen like this but now it was too late', 0)

('while taking a shortcut through an industrial area i noticed thick smoke coming from an old warehouse i saw a couple of kids running away laughing and looking back at the building within minutes flames were visible through the windows it was clear they had started the fire on purpose for fun i called the fire department but by the time they arrived the entire building was ablaze it was horrifying to see the consequences of their actions  ', 0)

('that night still haunts me i saw him from my window standing in the shadows it was clear he had planned everything he knew exactly when she would be walking home and he waited patiently he approached her with a false sense of security and then struck the way he manipulated her it was pure exploitation he took everything from her and left her broken on the ground he disappeared into the night like a ghost but i will never forget that face', 0)

('as a freshman on valentines day the fire alarm went off twice at my high school during the second alarm i heard gunshots and saw students running back to my classroom where my teacher locked us in i heard the shooter firing and people screaming after 30 minutes we were rescued the hallways were covered in blood and 17 people had died the calculated attack is unforgettable', 0)

('our foreman was a tough man but fair he had a heated argument with one of the workers who had been slacking off it was common for tempers to flare but this time things escalated coincidentally the worker returned later that day with a gun i was in the next aisle when i heard the shots by the time i got there the foreman was on the ground blood everywhere and the worker had fled the sound of gunshots still echoes in my mind', 0)
